name: Good Luck Tea
description:
Drink some tea if you're feeling lucky!

Click on the cups to earn coins. Use the coins to buy hints (which may be useless sometimes).

If you've had enough, give up (and walk away with some coins).

Made in 2hrs, 58 mins for Trijam #156: Tea Time.

Assets:
  • Pixel art by me
  • BGM from DavidKBD's Turbo Batido Chiptune, Rock & Metal Music Pack
  • Sound effects from GameSupplyGuy's Nintendo SFX pack
  • Font is datagoblin's Monogram (IT. IS. SO. CUTE.)
Ideas for improvement:

This section is mainly for me, to remember what I learned. But feel free to get some takeaways from it too.

  • Add some story elements. Why are you drinking poisoned tea? Maybe an NPC is guarding you.
  • Add more fun actions like "peek" which lets you look under a cup, but has a chance to end the game if you're caught cheating.
  • Maybe face off against the computer?
  • Raise the stakes. Add a dice. The number you roll is the amount of cups you must drink during that turn.
